dateCreated.description: The date/time of when the element was created.

dateModified.description: The date/time of when the element was modified.

dateDeleted.description: The date/time of when the element was deleted, as we never actually remove items.

nodeIdentity.description: The identity of the node which controls the vertex.

vertexObject.description: The JSON-LD object for the vertex.

aliases.description: Alternative aliases that can be used to identify the vertex.

resources.description: The resources attached to the vertex.

verified.description: Is the vertex verified, will only be populated when verification is requested.

description: Interface describing an auditable item graph vertex.
